Question
========

For random drawings with large samples, the sampling distribution of the sample mean is approximately normally distributed, regardless of the form of the distribution of the variable in the sample or population.

Which principle is described here?

Answerlist
----------
* Central Limit Theory
* Inferential Statistics
* Sampling Error
* Empirical Rule

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
